definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Macros exploit this fact by manipulating code as data before evaluating it.
sentences.chinese: 宏利用这种事实，在求值之前将代码作为数据操作。

sentences.english: Let's go one step further and write a hand evaluator for poker.
sentences.chinese: 让我们进一步编写扑克牌求值程序。

sentences.english: An expression that an assembler evaluates at pre -assembly time.
sentences.chinese: 汇编程序在预汇编时对其求值的一种表达式。

sentences.english: Otherwise, run the evaluator on each element of the list.
sentences.chinese: 否则，要对列表中的每一个元素运行求值程序。

sentences.english: Often, the order of operand evaluation has no impact on the result of the expression.
sentences.chinese: 通常，操作数的求值顺序不会影响表达式的结果。

sentences.english: This essay mainly introduces several evaluation methods of algebraic expression in common use.
sentences.chinese: 文章主要介绍代数式求值的几种常用方法。

sentences.english: A condition is an expression that is evaluated so that its result can be tested.
sentences.chinese: 条件是一个可求值的表达式，所以可以测试其结果。

definition: elimination (math)/to eliminate one variable from equations
surd (math.)/algebraic expression involving a square root or other irrationality
